staking_tip1: By staking your ZWAP, you will mint xZWAP. This will allow you to earn a portion of trading fees on the platform
staking_tip2: based on your share of the pool. Your xZWAP can be redeemed at anytime back into ZWAP,where you will be
staking_tip3: given your deposit plus fees earnt in additional ZWAP tokens.

addLiquidityPage.addLiquidityHelper: When you add liquidity, you are given pool tokens representing your position. These tokens automatically earn fees proportional to your share of the pool, and can be redeemed at any time.
addLiquidityPage.removeLiquidityHelper: Removing pool tokens converts your position back into underlying tokens at the current rate, proportional to your share of the pool. Accrued fees are included in the amounts you receive.
addLiquidityPage.estimatedOutputDesc: Output is estimated. If the price changes by more than {{data}}% your transaction will revert.
addLiquidityPage.firstLiquidityProvider: You are the first liquidity provider.
addLiquidityPage.ratioWillSetPrice: The ratio of tokens you add will set the price of this pool.
addLiquidityPage.happyWithRate: Once you are happy with the rate click supply to review.

referral.whyImportant: Why is referral important in AMO?
referral.descImportant: If someone buys with your referral number, you will receive 10% tokens on the purchase of who uses your referral number, and also because the system is AMO, your tokens will be more valuable (and tokens from the referral will also be more valuable).
